attributes.action: Vote in the lords by proportional representation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every general election sees a party first past the post.The votes could also be used proportionaly to elect 'sponsored lords' from the parties proportional vote.Independants could have there share as well with the individuals that did not get elected getting into the lords.This would also allow political parties to get there good candidates into work.It wouls also reflect properly the general will of the voter

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
